_header: Out of your sleep arise and wake
_description: James Ryman, a Christmas carol — nine quatrains (aaab) with ‘…virgyn marie quene of blis’ refrain and burden (bb): ‘The sonne of god man bicome is / Of virgyn marie quene of blis’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Oute of your slepe arryse and wakeffor god our manhode now hath
                    take…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Therin to see his glorious facewith virgyn marie quene of
                    blis
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 206-7.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 46; 1977, 38-9.
